caption: (Translated by Google) I love this place  (Original) Me encanto este lugar
The double smashed burguer doesn't look like the picture!
Nice place
Saw Casey Webb Ate your Fondue Burger in The F.I.D.I Area & Congrats on the New Clinton Hall in Staten Island
For the price, there is no better burger anywhere!!! Doesn't matter what kind of burger you want, they can make it, and for less than some fast food chains!
The place offers a great variety of delicious food. I love dining here. Staff members are always kind, pricing is fair and the spot is always clean.

two days ago was the first time we came to that magnificent restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last. We enjoyed the evening a lot with the attentive service, with the fine  food and fine drinks and with the comfortable price. We will no doubt visit there soon.
Great place for a beer and food is good, too
I had the classic house burger and it was absolutely amazing! Staff is very pleasant and prices are very reasonable. Can't wait to go back and tried the house made donuts

Good vibes and atmosphere. Would go again. However I don't recommend the mystery bucket beers. For 25 bucks, I think I only had one out of 5 beers I liked in that bucket. I would just order a pint from the tap instead. Truffle fries were excellent.

We stopped here for a quick drink and loved this place. They have a really decent selection of beers. We ordered the parmesan truffle fries which were amazing and wings were just as crisp and its name on the menu. Will definitely be returning
We randomly ended up here but had an epic time.

It’s so rare to find a bar with a great beer selection in NYC and this place really knocks it out of the park. The decor was trendy and the atmosphere was fun. I’ll definitely be back the next time I’m in the area.
great sliders, awesome drinks. definitely coming back. the environment is really nice too

We absolutely fell in love with this youthful place. With outside design elements which rival international street murals in most major cities, this is a spot to hang your coat. Beautifully decorated establishment coupled with strong food menu items and an extensive cocktail list. Definitely a spot to procrastinate with friends while playing board games (which they furnish) or simply pregame before you paint the town red. We highly recommend this place largely in part for their outstanding service and empanadas. And happy hour is hella lit!
Had a good time. Beer selection was good. Different sports playing on their big screen TV's. Good vibes
I come here after work and the atmosphere and service is always great. Harry knows the beers and always takes care of me and my group. Always look forward to a night at Clinton Hall!
Nice spot but they need new games. Most of the games are incomplete

the food is fine but I've gone 2 separate times in the last 3 months since I've lived here and both times they have charged $15 for the Double Smash "so called best burger in NY" burger when on the menu it says $14. I mentioned it to my waiter the first time and again 3 months later. I will not go back. I don't like feeling like people are trying to sneak money out of me.
If your an adult this is not the bar for you. Bar is for college students or young people from out of time.
They were able to seat 3 families and were really cool about it. Didn't mind the kids. We really liked it. There were Fordham kids there too. It just seemed like everyone was welcome.

Happy hours and great american bar atmosphere. Depending of the day the staff can be super friendly or can take a long time for taking care of you. food is good, a little bit overpriced. Vegetarian and vegan options available!:
Cool vibes
Good place for a beer and some munchies!

Stopped in for a New York State craft beer after the Fordham game. It made the loss a little more tolerable. Nice seating on communal tables made for easy conversation. Will return to try the award winning burger.
Nice cool chill bar. A few TV'S to watch the games. A lot of college kids. Nice happy hour menu.
Excellent great food and atmosphere!

I've been here a few times stumbled upon it on my way to little Italy. Small space nothing too big like other beer halls but it's cool. The vibe is pretty chill, music is usually good nice little mix for everyone of old and new. The food is pretty good too great with there food beers and they have tons of yummy beer options. They have funky desserts too which was different pretty delish too. The service is always good and it's usually kinda empty when I go but it gets crowded quick and before you know it every table is filled and the bar. They have table top games they offer for free which is cool. Almost like the bronx ale house, crowd is similar too. Fordham U runs that area so you'll see a good amount of college kids stopping by.
Too loud...
Great environment good burgers
I'll give them 5 stars if they stop using plastic utensils and cups. 20 good beers on tap, good food, collegiate crowd but not too loud and sports TVs aren't too in-your-face
The service was good, beer was awesome... The hot chicken sandwich was for babies. No heat what soever. Hardly any of the games seen on the website. Menu could be a little more versatile.

Giant burgers. Giant rotating rap list. Giant satisfaction... And possibly giant girth after dining here. Very streamlined menu but everything on it so far has been fantastic. You're here for burgers, and they are all amazing. The appetizer / sides are decent. ONE EXCEPTION: pass on the Truffle fries. You pay an absurd amount of money for a small bit of sprinkled cheese and a tiny smidge of Truffle oil. Possibly the most disappointing Truffle fries I've had, especially considering the pretty penny you spend on them.
Super 😎

Cute tucked away spot right in the Bronx. Fun atmosphere, yummy food, great selection of beers.  Not sure if I want it to get too famous or popular cause it'll be hard to get a seat!  But I enjoyed my visit and am glad I discovered this little gem doing a random Google search for Bronx beergarden and burgers!
I had fun
Only went once, fun time
Nice place big screens good food cold drinks
Go-to spot. Extensive beer selection. Buffalo cauliflower - wow. Solid burgers too. Can't go wrong here.
Kitchen closes early, staff was not helpful and did not know what was still open, to make up for the kitchen closed
Great service.  Excellent Burger.  Nice atmosphere.
Fun spot and has games on the tables while u eat and or drink
Better than smashburgers!
This place is the new Nicky's! I'm glad I came across this spot. Great vibe, delicious food, and great beers!!
Forever a place with great food and amazing beers, friendly warming staff and a homey atmosphere

Bartender was super dope! The fries were amazing and my best friend destroyed her fondue burger lol so I guess it was amazing also. Goose w/ cranberry was $5 for happy hour which is almost unheard of so keep em coming lol
Fun place

Clinton hall is a more of a sports bar with a young college-going clientele. The place is almost always full but filled with a pleasant fun crowd.  The food is delicious and to the point. I would strongly recommend the $5 small plates during their happy hour! Its a rare and welcome diamond in this part of Bronx!
Very nice place good food busy place
The food wasn't great but the bartender was very nice, the bathroom smelled like pee
If you burgers and beers 🍻 this is the place, small but cozy and happy hour specials until 7pm. Service is ok food is out quick!
Great beer and burgers. Gotta try the smash burger
Nice place. Great burgers. Making a lot of changes so don't go by the menu online.
Cool spot with a simple menu and a nice beer selection. My burger and fries were pretty good. Beer was nice and cold.

As a regular at ch I can say that the place is amazing the beer here is perfect and the food is awesome And Harry is the best I honestly have positive words about this place hope to come again tomorrow
Great place.
Burger was good. A bit understaffed.
Fantastic place!!! Food was amazing and super fresh!!!
Only place like it in that area of the Bronx
Great
Nice college bar with games and great beer. Off Color Jerk Bird was one of my faves!
Nice place & Nice food
Too much food that tastes great. Not Keto!
They have decent food and they seemed to be popular with the local crowd. I would visit again to see what the hype is about. Can be kind of crowded and we visited on a Saturday night.

nice atmosphere, games to play, friendly bartenders, and reasonably priced aps for happy hour about $$ signs. Has a ramp for wheel chair access. i went there on a Wednesday and had a good crowd from the fordham uni kids. Only problem was a group of loud obnoxious laughing people near the bar, had to move far from them. But usually there on a Friday after work and it's good atmosphere.
Seriously awesome ! Truffle fries are amazing ! And I ordered the fondu burger. Delish I will be getting more food soon !
Cool place to hang out with friends.

First time at Clinton Hall (Bronx)... I was pleased with the service - food was good & came out fast. We ordered Guac and chips to start, Bacon, Bacon, Bacon Cheese Burger w/Onion Rings & Cheese Fries Fondue Burger w/Fries.. Music would have been nice, but the atmosphere was pretty relax, young, mixed crowd. I would go back for sure! Its a cool local spot in the BX & reasonable prices!
Great food. Great service...... And cheap.
Comfortable pub-type place to have some drinks and burgers for a quick night out. Plenty of beer choices.
Always a good time at CH, Good selection of beers, bar food and Burgers. TVs to watch the games and a selection of board games to entertain yourselves, chill vibe for the whole family.
Loved it

The best place to study, meet up for lunch, etc..New to the area and it's becoming me and my friends spot. Being a grad school student is stressful and its just a few mins away from all of us to meet up.  The food is great. Ohh btw I'm BLACK from head to toe and we've never encountered racism over there. Everyone is chill ❤️
Sltighly overpriced, especially for the area, but otherwise ok
Good atmosphere. Good $5 happy hour deals on beer and food. Not a big place so not a good idea for a big crowd.  I would definitely come back.
My second time here and the service was quite mediocre. first time was much better. Not sure I'd  go back. However  I enjoyed the food both times.
Good food great experience

We had the Clinton Hall classic and a chicken sandwich. If you’re inclined to get her classic, you might want to ask for them to put the sauce on the side. Mine was covered in a white sauce, which made the burger unappetizing to me. The chicken sandwich was good and I very much enjoyed the truffle fries. I would like to come back and try another burger, over I would say this is a good burger joint.
Fantastic place. I also frequent the Fidi location
Decent beer selection, and the cauliflower is a good snack.
Chill vibes, great games,  good beer
It was GREAT AND FUN
Kinda small spot
Great environment, Many beer selections, Attentive Staff
Went for the burger which wasn't great. The buffalo cauliflower and beer are the way to go. Happy Hour has great choices.
Cool place. Good beer and games. Fordham students prowl the place so be advised. Yes, that was meant to offend Fordham students.
Great beer variety. Happy alive full with young guests (Students)
Food is excellent low key spot. Loved the fondue burger and the injection filling donuts. Mimosa was good too. Good place to catch sporting events and Brunch is from 12-4 on weekends

Wasnt as cool as insider made it lol. The waiter was a rude,sarcastic dude. The burgers were okay needed some seasoning. The fries were good. It's a real chill spot though. Great for hanging and conversation!
Amazing place great beers, epic burgers
Decent food. The cheeseburger empanadas are really good.
The Hefeweisen wasn't on tap, the slider was so small, and there's no WiFi. The German pretzel was big though.
If you haven't been here you're still in the womb.
Great food. Happy hour has also appetizers. Nice place to drink and grab a bite after work!
Fun  hangout for after work small plates and/or drinks.   Have a variety of games available (life size jenga, scrabble, others) so  better to go with friends

I’m giving it a 2 because when I came in they took long to give me service , and since I’m Spanish and my husband is Hispanic but dark skin they want to give us attitude and not be polite and I didn’t like the service ..they need discipline on how to be good servers 😩😩😩🤔 I don’t like to complain , but I was disappointed, so I had to do this . I guess since it was 10 and they wanted to leave and we was the only customers and we kept ordering food..  I really enjoy eating out  but I don’t know if I’ll be back 😢
Good burgers great beer

Burgers are pretty good and filling. Fries could be reduced portion wise, i've eaten there several times and everytime I leave a lot of fries. Perhaps they'd save a few bucks this way. Beer selection is cool and slightly pricey for the BX but most are local so show your support. Love the variety though. In house table games for groups, families or even couples brings a fun factor to the establishment. Overall, nice downtown feel brought uptown. 👍
Great place for happy hour and sports.
Good beer selection and good food, they also have a few
Great beer selection and even better burgers
Great service and nice beer selection.
Food and beer are great and they have fun games with a nice atmosphere.

The beer selection is typically great, the food is decent but not great (I like a little more flavor in my food), and the service is good. It's a great place to go have a beer and enjoy a game or two as they have various board and card games available for play.

Great food, super friendly staff. I'm vegetarian and they still have a good selection. Lots of different choices on tap. The games are a great way to pass time with friends. This place has a relaxed, welcoming environment.
The manager was great. They have great service .

Great addition to Belview, Bronx! Kevin, the head bartender/psuedo- manager is a great guy. He delights 8n customers' satisfaction and knows their beer selection inside/out. Just ask him what to drink and he won't steer you wrong!
Excellent burgers and beers! The only "negative" point would be the very limited selection of desserts.
Very nice place to go to good food
Awesome place!!!!!! Love the 🍔🍟🍺. Highly recommended. Stop by
I haven’t tried the food yet but it looks fantastic. Knowledgeable and friendly bar staff and a great line up of beers. I’m kind of shocked it’s taken me so long to discover this place.

Cool spot. The best around, really, given that most of the other places around are swarming with students from Fordham. Great selection of craft beers, and a selection of board games if you're into that. Recommended.
All the staff at Clinton hall are excellent, very attentive, and friendly, especially my man Ed aka pops he's so cool made the experience 10x better, will definitely come back!!! 🔥💪😊
Fun food great staff, wish it would had open sooner
Nice place,  good beer selection ..try the doughnut.

Such a cool place, went on date night with the hubby.  I just moved from the neighborhood and cant believe I had never been  before when I lived so close by and now found it when I'm further away.  Great giant board games, ad plenty of food options and beers I still have to try! Will definitely be back!

My Wife and I have been coming to this location if not weekly, certainly a few times a month for the last year. This place feels like home to us. The staff is attentive and great but the food is the main show. The food is absolutely AMAZING! EACH TIME! As much as we go here, we’re never disappointed. I do wish they expanded their dessert menu a bit but I’ll be coming here forever and ever amen.

Food was good. Service was terrible. Water was never refilled. Napkins weren’t given with the food. We ordered 9 tequila shots and we were only given 8. When we asked for the 9th shot they looked at us like we were lying and then they took 25 minutes to get us the shot. Only after they counted our glasses. We brought a cake in from outside and the manager came to us with a stink face and said we had to pay a $25 cake cutting fee. We were fine with paying the fee but his attitude was terrible. We asked for plates and the waitress dropped them on the table as she passed by without even looking at us. They also dropped the check at the table without us asking and we were still having drinks. I won’t be coming back here again.
Soooo yummy. I looked at the reviews and decided to try ot the fondue burger and I was not disappointed. Looking forward to trying more items next time but I fell in love with the fondue burger 😍

Nice intimate Fordam University area pub. Good food freshly prepared, huge selection of all manner of malt beverages. Forty years ago I would have loved it. For the young-uns it's got a great vibe, good food reasonably priced and every beer you ever wanted. It's all good.
The idea of this place is great however, food is average.  Looks better on instagram.  Definitely recommend if you are just looking to have a good time and a beer.

Overall service very good. Nice games.  The bacon bacon bacon burger was good from my boyfriends plate. But honestly the fondue burger was tasteless. I asked for well done was still pink inside. The burger had no flavor at all. Not even the cheese made it better. Bun also tasted weird.  So all the hype about this burger. Definitely not worth $16. Then the waiter offered options on fries. We assumed they came along with the meal. But we were charged extra for choosing waffle fries n onion rings. Server should have explained that.

username: chiste y noticias para el pueblo

caption: Great beer pub,nice staff,good selection of craft and imported beers.

There are better options!!.. the service is terrible. My friend and I sat at the bar.. she got onion rings,  the bartender took the tray away before she ate half of the dish, then said he thought she was finished.. like what?  He then didn't know how to work the tv.  He also kept talking about his personal relationship with other coworkers while at the bar.  Definitely a NO!!

This was our first time at a Clinton Hall establishment and we're definitely coming back! We had a wonderful Happy Hour, enjoyed some great dishes, and had a blast with the games.  There is a giant Scrabble board on a wall if you are interested or other old school games, i.e. Uno, Jenga, or even the fishing game!  The bartender, Kevin, was absolutely friendly / down to earth, knowledgeable about the beers on tap, helpful with menu recommendations, and attentive to all the folks in the restaurant.  We ordered the Erdinger Hefeweizen and the Clinton Hall IPA off the Happy Hour drink list and were pleased with our choices.  We ordered the Fondue Cheeseburger; the Bacon, Bacon, Bacon Burger; and the Crystal Methadonuts.  Our food came out promptly, was absolutely delicious, and sent us into food baby city!
Great place
Nice chill bar! I had appetizers only: chicken quesadillas, onion wings and the Parmesan truffle fries. Everything tasted amazing! Along with a game of connect four and oversized jenga!!!
Great Burgers and Chicken.
Good beer selection and food.
Wide range of craft beers and burgers, reasonably priced and well-described on the menu. Service can sometimes be slow.
Amazing food/beer/cider but slow service

Ask for a stout was brought an IPA. Then the waiter proceeded to lie to me and tell me that it was a stout until he finally admitted that there was no stout. Did not even offer 2 replace the beer with something else.
Great beer selections, nice burgers. Not cheap but good vibe and lots of fun games and bug screen TVs.
Great place for craft beer and burgers with a great menu selection!

Really enjoyed my first few visits however I went to go for brunch 3 weeks ago and the server seemed to be checked out. Watched 3 tables walk out without being served and the server/bartender was just standing around with a blank look on his face. Eventually we walked out without being served and he watched us leave without saying a word.
So much fun, finger foods are amazing!
This place has one of the best draft beers in the area and incredible buffalo wings.
Great place love the food, cool games
Nice. Enjoyed games.
The staff gets us.

Clinton Hall is a very unique place in the area. There is a unique mural highlighting the entrance and inside it’s very cozy. They have games for when you’re with a group like Giant Jenga, Connect Four and more.  Try Walter White’s Crystal Methadonuts. You won’t regret it.

Awesome craft burger. Had the Fondue Burger burger. Just one bite and the cheese oozes out of the burger, accompanied by Parmesan truffle fries. My husband had the Parmesan crispy burger with the loaded waffle fries. Everything was great. Very lay back vibe. Great for groups. Must have the Walter doughnuts. Small cinnamon circular balls that you can inject with 3 flavors (included) cherry, chocolate and caramel.
Burgers were underwhelming. Nice chill spot though for bite to eat.
One of the best burgers in the Bronx.  Even better is they're open late
(Translated by Google) Good atmosphere are eaten and beautiful concert  (Original) Buen ambiente estén comido y hermoso concierto
Menu had many unique burgers that tasted awesome.  The staff was very attentive and friendly.
Great bar!
Great beer list. Giant burgers, very fresh and delicious. I like the atmosphere and its a nice spot to go for football, or before/after your day in BX Little Italy.
Amazing food and amazing drinks. Staff is beyond kind and helpful. If you go, look for Miranda or Eric. Beyond Amazing!!!!!
They have an enormous jenga set and checkers.  It's a laid back environment

Best black bean burger I have had to date. They make it themselves and it has a flavorful kick to it that is not overpowering. Topped with fresh guacamole and fried onions on a potato bun. Follow that is a great beer from their 20 on tap and you can do no wrong. I will say be weird of ordering dessert unless you have a group of four with you or are still that hungry as a tower of ice cream and waffles topped with cake will take you down if you aren't careful.  If you wish to have a great cocktail ask Chris to make you the best whiskey sour you will have in the Bronx. You can do no wrong and he makes it from scratch and proper.Miranda a great bartender with a good attitude, she knows her beer and is friendly. Between the two you would want to be a regular at this bar.  I will be returning, no quarrels with this place and in a great location.
Loved the food and eye candy 🍭 😉👌🏼
Amazing selection of beers on tap and also the burgers and fries were great tried the waffle fries and the truffle fries. Highly recommend this spot.
Cool place, great staff. Many craft/draft beers on tap & a pretty diverse menu choice.  😎
Nothing special. Wasn't overly impressed with the sausage I ordered. Brussels sprouts were a little too crunchy. Dead on Saturday afternoon (surprisingly) but friendly wait staff.
Fun games and good food

We stopped here on a whim after checking out the Botanical Gardens. Delicious wings and truffle fries. Knowledgeable and friendly staff and excellent craft beer selection. Loved my experience here. Great place to stop in the Bronx!
Looks nice. Probably out of college kids price range for the most part, but good selection
Cool and cozy. Awesome super craft beer and burgers.  Bartenders are friendly and knowledgeable. Waffle fries are a must. Plus the donuts are super fun to fill.
Cute bar, games tv's, and good prices!

I don't normally write long reviews but this was such a unique craft beer quest that I just had to take up all this space haha!  My boyfriend and I were coming from Jersey on our bikes and we decided to go bar-hopping in Bronx Little Italy. We were just riding around until we stumbled upon this nicely lit bar and that was by far, the best decision we made on this Easter Sunday!  The bar wasn't too crowded when we arrived around 9:00PM. We left our bikes outside and the manager noticed we didn't have our  locks with us so he kindly offered us a space inside to stow our bikes. That was really thoughtful of him! Thank you!!  We looked at their menu and we are quite pleasantly surprised at the amount of craft beers they have available! We started with #9 and #17 (I think this one is passion fruit based. I could not remember their names to be exact). The latter was quite tart and refreshing!  Afterwards, we ordered the Fondue Burger and Trufle Fries. The meat was just exploding with flavor and it was still quite juicy even though we ordered it well-done! The cheese is literally oozing out of the burger at the first bite. The Fries were nice and thinly cut and so damn crispy! It is sprinkled with a little bit of Parmesan cheese and herbs. This combo goes really well with the Trufle oil they cooked it in. I just made myself hungry again....  For dessert, we had the Walter White's Methadonuts. This was such a super cute concept! They have these little syringes filled Nutella, Berry Jam, and Caramel that you can inject your delicious freshly-fried gooey donuts with!  We finished off with a strawberry-based craft beer and an apple-based craft beer. By far, that apple beer was my favorite! It was sweet; not tart at all and very mild like an apple cider but less sweet and less sour. The manager gave us nice beer samples throughout the night and overall was a good company :) On top of that, the service here was impeccable!  I can't wait to come back to this place and try other burgers and drinks!
The place is amazing! 20 different craft beers, friendly bartenders and the best burgers you will ever find !  If you haven't been here yet- you missed out! Must go!!!!
Saw the outdoor mural and decided to check it out. Fun spot! Great for the college crowd. Lots of beer on tap and comfort food on the menu.  Had the Walter White doughnuts. 👅

Checked out Clinton Hall opening weekend with a group of friends and had a great time. Beautiful space with a chill vibe, great crowd and the largest selection of craft beer ever. The burgers were delicious and the buffalo cauliflower was amazing. Try the donuts - so much fun injecting the fillings! We also played connect four while we drank :) Doesnt get better than that. Truly a gem in the neighborhood.
